body: As I commented on https://go-review.googlesource.com/#/c/19987, I don't believe suffix array code (neither index/suffixarray nor the more complex variants being suggested) has any place in a linker. Let's find a way to get the benefit without such heavy machinery. The cost here is enormous for very little benefit. 50% longer link time to reduce output size by 1% is not the tradeoff we want to encourage.
